title: Verify Hero Section Renders and Animates Correctly
description: Ensure the cinematic hero section loads with the correct video background and text reveal animations on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

steps.description: Load the home page on desktop viewport
Video background plays correctly without errors
Text reveal animation triggers smoothly and completes
Resize viewport to tablet size and reload
Hero section elements adjust responsively with correct layout and animations
Resize viewport to mobile size and reload
Hero section elements display correctly with animations on mobile

title: Validate Infinite Scrolling Marquee Displays Strategic Keywords
description: Check that the infinite scrolling marquee renders correct keywords continuously and scrolls smoothly across desktop and mobile.

steps.description: Navigate to homepage
Marquee displays all strategic keywords without truncation
Scrolling is smooth with no jitter or freezing
Use mobile viewport to reload page
Marquee remains visible and scrolls smoothly on mobile

title: Detailed Services Section Loads with Interactive Cards and Animations
description: Verify the services section presents all five ecosystem pillars with interactive cards that respond to hover or tap and animations are fluid.

steps.description: Scroll to Services Section on desktop
All five ecosystem pillars are displayed
Hover over each service card
Interactive animations trigger on hover
Repeat on tablet/mobile with tap interactions
Animations and interactivity work correctly on touch devices

title: Featured Project Carousel Functionality with 3D Flip Effects
description: Ensure the 3D carousel of featured projects loads correctly and allows navigation with flip animations on desktop and mobile.

steps.description: Locate the featured projects carousel on homepage
Carousel displays multiple project items correctly
Click next and previous controls on desktop
3D flip animation triggers smoothly and projects change accordingly
Swipe carousel on mobile devices
Swipe causes 3D flip transition and updates carousel correctly

title: Looping Image Gallery Renders and Scrolls Smoothly
description: Verify that the looping image gallery loads all images correctly and animates with smooth scrolling without freezing or glitches.

steps.description: Navigate to the looping gallery section
All intended images are visible and loaded without broken links
Scroll horizontally or vertically as designed
Scrolling and looping animation is continuous and fluid

title: About Section Displays Company Information and Visuals Correctly
description: Check the About SEEA section loads company's story and founder's vision with proper visuals and text formatting across devices.

steps.description: Scroll to About Section on desktop
Company information is readable and complete
Visual presentation elements load correctly
Repeat on tablet and mobile viewports
Layout adjusts responsively and content remains accessible

title: Client Testimonials Load and Integrate with Trustindex Widget
description: Confirm that client testimonials section loads the Google Reviews widget (Trustindex) properly and displays client feedback dynamically.

steps.description: Scroll to Testimonials section
Testimonials content is loaded and visible
Trustindex widget loads without errors and displays up-to-date reviews
Test responsiveness on mobile
Widget remains functional and legible on mobile

title: FAQ Section Accordion Cards Expand and Collapse Smoothly
description: Test the FAQ section's expandable accordion cards open and close with animations without layout issues on all major devices.

steps.description: Navigate to FAQ section
Click on multiple accordion headers
Corresponding FAQ answers expand with smooth animation
Click again to collapse the same accordions
Accordion content collapses smoothly without leaving blank space or flickering
Test on desktop and mobile devices

title: Overlay Navigation Menu Opens and Closes with Fluid Transitions and Accessibility
description: Verify the overlay navigation menu triggers open and close with smooth fullscreen transitions and supports keyboard navigation and ARIA attributes.

steps.description: Click to open the overlay navigation menu
Menu appears with smooth transition and covers full screen
All menu links are visible and clickable
Navigate menu using keyboard (Tab, Shift+Tab)
Focus moves correctly between interactive elements
Close the menu by clicking close button or pressing Escape key
Menu closes with fluid transition to underlying page

title: Floating WhatsApp CTA Button Triggers Correct Pre-Defined Message and Link
description: Ensure the floating WhatsApp call-to-action button is visible, remains fixed on screen, and opens WhatsApp with the correct message and link.

steps.description: Observe presence of floating WhatsApp CTA button on all pages and viewports
Button remains fixed in position and is not obstructed by other UI elements
Click the WhatsApp CTA button
WhatsApp app or web opens with pre-defined message content ready to send
The link uses correct phone number and message content as specified

title: Mega Footer Displays Contact Info, Social Links, and Google Map Correctly
description: Validate that the footer contains all contact details, social media icons linking correctly, and an embedded Google Map loads the SEEA location without errors.

steps.description: Scroll to bottom of page to display footer
Contact information is complete and readable
Social media icons are visible and link to correct profiles
Google Maps iframe loads without errors showing SEEA location
Resize viewport to tablet and mobile sizes
Footer layout adjusts responsively and elements remain accessible

title: Global Smooth Scrolling Powered by Lenis Functions Correctly
description: Confirm that smooth scrolling experience is consistent and responsive across devices using Lenis library without stutter or jumps.

steps.description: Scroll vertically through the entire website on desktop
Scrolling is smooth without jitter, skipping, or abrupt position changes
Scroll on mobile and tablet devices
Smooth scrolling persists and maintains consistent speed

title: Preloader Screen Animates Brand Identity During Page Loading
description: Verify the preloader screen with brand animation displays during the initial page load and disappears correctly once loading completes.

steps.description: Refresh page or open fresh tab
Preloader screen appears immediately with brand identity animation
Preloader remains visible during page loading and disappears once complete
No deadlocks or indefinite preloader display occur

title: SEO Metadata is Present and Correct in Page Headers
description: Check that all pages include correct SEO metadata such as titles and descriptions matching product goals and page content.

steps.description: Inspect head element of the home page
Page title matches expected branding and content
Meta description tag is present and accurately describes content
Check meta tags for OpenGraph and Twitter Cards presence and correctness

title: Validate Website Performance Meets Core Web Vitals and Lighthouse Scores
description: Run performance tests to ensure FCP < 1.5s, LCP < 2.5s, CLS < 0.1, and Lighthouse accessibility, SEO, best practices scores are above 90.

steps.description: Open homepage with default network and CPU throttling disabled
FCP is under 1.5 seconds
LCP is under 2.5 seconds
CLS score is below 0.1
Run Lighthouse audit and verify scores >= 90 for performance, accessibility, SEO, best practices

title: Test Animated UI Components Trigger Correctly and Perform Smoothly
description: Validate various text reveal, shimmering text, and other animated UI components activate on scroll or interaction without performance degradation or layout issues.

steps.description: Scroll through all content sections containing animated UI components
Text reveal animations trigger as they enter the viewport
Shimmering text effects are visible and smooth
No layout shifts or flickering occur during animations

title: Verify Accessibility of Interactive Elements Across Devices
description: Ensure that interactive UI elements including navigation, accordions, carousels, and buttons comply with accessibility standards, support keyboard navigation and screen readers.

steps.description: Perform keyboard-only navigation through menus, accordions, and carousels
Focus outlines are visible on all focusable elements
ARIA roles and labels are present and descriptive for screen readers
Test with screen reader enabled navigating each section
Content and interactive controls are announced correctly
